1500370.name: Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys
1500370.description:
About Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys


Immerse yourself in the mystical lands of Crewin, a realm where legends come alive, in this enthralling Fantasy RPG. "Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys" invites you on an epic journey filled with peril and intrigue. As a humble inhabitant of Black Hollow, you are thrust into a monumental quest against the malevolent cult, The Flaming Eye. Their dark mission? To commandeer the elemental dragons and unleash Athys, the goddess of Chaos and Destruction, plunging the world into a millennia of unending darkness. Are you ready to forge your legacy and thwart their sinister plot?

Key Features


  • Souls-Inspired Combat System: Engage in a challenging and rewarding combat experience reminiscent of the Souls series. Master an arsenal of weapons, learn the art of directional rolling, perfect your parries, and execute devastating special attacks. Whether you prefer the finesse of single-handed weapons, the power of two-handed armaments, the precision of archery, or the thrill of dual-wielding, our combat system caters to every warrior's style.

  • A Richly Woven Narrative: Delve into a world brimming with lore and adventure. "Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys" isn't just about the main storyline; it's a tapestry of tales waiting to be discovered. Embark on side quests and crucial questlines that not only complement the main narrative but also enrich your understanding of Crewin's mystical world.

  • Mod Support (In Development): We believe in the power of community-driven creativity. That's why we're excited to announce that mod support is in the works! Soon, you'll be able to extend your adventure and express your creativity by crafting and sharing your own modifications.

  • Innovative Save System: Our unique save system utilizes bonfires as checkpoints. Not only do they offer a respite from your arduous journey, but they also serve as a strategic tool to reset your stats and strategize your next moves.

Prepare to embark on a journey through mystical landscapes, face formidable foes, and unravel the secrets of Crewin. Your odyssey awaits in "Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys."
